transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, sir, Mohammad Asif.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir. Ji, sir, main Hiba Trading se baat kar raha hun.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Maine yahan pe naya wo subscription liya hai ek saal wala. Mere information live hui hai kal. Mere condition thi ki mujhe address jahan main hun, business hai, wahan ka dalna hai. Unhone kiya bhi last mein wapas mere hometown ka address dal diya. Wo update karna hai. Koi specific topic pe is topic pe koi khas response mujhe mil nahi raha hai. Mujhe arrange karaiye call aur ye change karaiye otherwise I will cancel the subscription. I am not going to do all this thing because meri condition thi ki aap Lucknow mein.
Executive: Kahan hai sir aap?
Customer: Lucknow mein hai aap?
Executive: Hmm. To aapko aap dekho sir jo address jo GST pe hota hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wahi GST wahi address update ko update hota hai yahan pe.
Customer: Thik hai. To jo GST pe address hai wahi address update bhi karana hai mujhe.
Wahi update hota hai. GST pe address kya hai aapka?
Customer: Mallahi Tola aa raha hai yahan pe. Ye hai kahan Barafpana Mallahi Tola. To ye aa kahan raha hai? Ye to Ghazipur dikha raha hai yahan pe.
Executive: Ek second main dekh le raha hun.
Executive: Ye nahi aapka jo principal place of business hai na wo pada Susande Ghazipur hi hai.
Customer: Wo mujhe nahi chahiye tha. Maine paisa pay karne se pehle hi condition rakhi thi.
Executive: Kisse aap kisne aapko diya tha aapko bata raha hun package?
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Nitesh. Nitesh Kumar.
Executive: Thik hai main apne senior se baat kar leta hun. Unhone khud bhi kaha hai kal bhi unhone kaha hai aap tension mat lo ho jayega sir ye live ho jayega fir hum change kara denge. Kal bhi kaha hai parso bhi kaha hai. Maine shuru se keh raha hun ki mujhe jab wahan kam nahi karna hun to Ghazipur ka local address kyun show kar rahe hain? Mujhe party mujhe fir milegi nahi is tarah se. Main jahan center hub mein baitha hun jahan se kam hota hai wahan ka address chahiye kyunki wo mention mere ko.
Executive: Customer ko wahan gaon se thodi jayega mere purvajon ke gaon mein jayega abao ajdad ke gaon mein ja ke kaun kam karega? Main business hub mein baitha hun yahan se koi customer hi nahi hath lagega mere pe. Ye meri condition thi uske baad in logon ne aisa kiya. I will not bear all this.
Executive: Written mein liya tha aapne? Written mein liya tha aapne?
Customer: Written written nahi wo kuch kar bhi nahi payenge. Yahi office pe ja ke fir hum agar khali ek bar bol de ki nahi ho payega ye log fir hum unse written karwa lenge acche se. Mazak karne thodi baithe hain yahan pe hum. 50-50 hazar ka faltu ka 40-40 hazar ja raha hai kya phokat ka aata hai kya? Hum unko khali keh de ki nahi hoga ye capital address rahega ye change nahi ho sakta fir humko sahi kar denge acche se. Mazak karne nahi baithe itna asani se paisa nahi nikalte hain.
Customer: Commitment kar ke bar bar bol ke bhi agar palti marenge sahi nahi hoga. Mujhe aaj ki date mein ye live bhi live mein change kar ke chahiye. Mujhe koi matlab nahi nikal raha hai itna paisa barbad kar ke.
Executive: Kitna time hua hai aapki ek hi kal hi service kal hi live hua hai. Kal live hua hai mera subscription ya to cancel kare paisa wapas kare nahi to mera sab kuch jo commitment kar ke gaye hain wo change kar ke chahiye humko.
Executive: Haan sir ek bar ek bar main apne senior se bhi baat kar le raha hun. Dekhiye ye jo pura jo ye hai na ye jo address wala mamla hai. Do point aapke hain ek to pehle address wala hai. To address wala main ek bar senior se baat kar leta hun. Nahi hoga hoga ya nahi hoga confirmation main de dunga aapko ki is mudda kya hai. Dusra business wala to kal hi services live hui hai. To isme mahine bhar jata hai to main aapko matlab jhooti commitment shuru mein hi jaise aap bata rahe ho jab serious business mein leke to main jhooti commitment koi bhi nahi dena chahta hun aapko.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thoda time jata hai business nikalne mein aapko.
Customer: Business order nikalne mein aapke.
Customer: Order ki baat nahi hai. Main nahi keh raha hun ki order raton raat mujhe order hazaron ton ka mil jayega. Mera address to kam se kam wahan ka dalo jahan main baitha hun kam kar raha hun. Ye main masla hai na jo local parties hain ya agal bagal ki wo Ghazipur thodi jayegi yaar 500 kilometer aage wo khud hi hath nahi dalegi yaar transport ka paisa kaun dega? Jo local yahan baithe hue hain hub mein Rekabganj hai Maru ye sari parties hain inko ye lagega ki chalo yahan se yahan 200 400 500 rupye bhada lagega mal mil jayega. Hum Ghazipur batayenge to 10 rupye kilo kaun dene jayega fir wo per kilo? Koi wo to wahi baat main keh raha hun aapse ki wahan ka.
Executive: Dekhiye do tarike hain agar nahi hoga na to varna fir aapko GST pe jo address hai na aapko kariye.
Customer: Hmm. Hmm.
Executive: GST pe address aap karayenge to ye automatic yahan pe update ho jata hai. Baharhal ab dekhna GST pe kya karayenge?
Customer: Principal address kabhi change nahi hota hai. Branch address add hoga delete hoga. Principal address kabhi change nahi hota. Kabhi nahi change hota hai. Ab branch address pada hua hai wo condition rakh ke uska screenshot deke maine uske baad haan bulwa ke tab maine diya hai paisa.
Executive: Asal mein aapki visibility bhi aise depend karta hai na IndiaMART pe visibility.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo aapka jo home hometown matlab hometown jahan pe aapka matlab GST pe jo principal address hai usko pakad ke wahin pe bhi dikhata hai. Man lijiye to wahan pe to abhi 250 saal pehle wo 250 saal purana abhi usko Lucknow ke equivalent mein aane mein abhi 100 saal lagega. Wahan pe koi consumer hi nahi hai yaar. Wahan pe koi chalta hi nahi hai sab chiz wahan population nahi hai wahan consumer nahi hai wahan consumption nahi hai wahan hum karenge kya visibility kara ke?
Executive: Wahi to ye zaruri hai aapka matlab Lucknow ho jaye usi mein bhalai hai.
Customer: Haan. Main aapke baat aap baat kar ke mujhe abhi confirm kariye nahi to fir inke branch pe ja ke bhi baat karte hain.
Executive: Haan aisa dena tha jab karwana tha to chakkar pe chakkar kate pade the. Abhi koi phone nahi utha raha hai. Kya phone hi nahi utha raha hai. 70 haan koi phone nahi utha raha hai.
Customer: Aap karaiye isko baat kar ke mujhe ek bar khali confirm kar dijiye nahi hoga bas itna bata dijiye. Haan ho gaya nahi hoga confirm kar dunga baki aap apna step jaisa hoga lena hoga aap lijiyega. Haan hum batate hain client ko bahut acche se.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants address updated to Lucknow, not Ghazipur.

- Address showing incorrectly on IndiaMART profile.

- Threatens to cancel subscription if unresolved.



Resolution:

- Executive will check with senior regarding address change.

- Explained GST address is used for updates.

- Executive will confirm if address change is possible.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide confirmation after senior consultation.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- address, gst, subscription, refund, cancellation
